name: XDShape
tagline: UIButton && UIImageView round circled image and square
body:
# About XDShape

XDShape is a simple extension of > UIImageView and > UIButton to allows those outlets to have a circled image shape or squared image shape. Plus, you can also add a border to the shape.

![Example](http://postimg.org/image/544gtlf75/)

# Requirements
* Xcode
* iOS

# Questions
Feel free to contact me via Twitter @Xod_CM if you need any help with XDShape.

# License
Nope
